Name: Frogworld
About the game: Experience a day in the life of a common bullfrog. Your home environment is being polluted. The very water in which you live is becoming poisonous to the touch. To live another day, you will need to find a new, healthier ecosystem. The journey will not be easy! Your creek is home to many natural predators and other obstacles–-all of which you will need to pass to find your new home. It’s a big day for a little frog. -- Frogworld is the first release from NatureSims, an indie studio dedicated to building first-person VR experiences that bring users closer to nature. Please note that the game requires a compatible VR headset and SteamVR to be installed on your computer for the headset and controllers to work properly.
Meta Title: Frogworld: Aug 14, 2020, NatureSims and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Frogworld? Check out the release date (Aug 14, 2020), developer insights from NatureSims, and a complete game summary.
